desc: Urban dining and contemporary Californian cuisine intersect deliciously at this sleek lounge, where sustainable "farm-to-table" dishes using local ingredients are served alongside craft cocktails to a modern fusion of DJ music.
Handcrafted cocktails, a wide selection of wines, small plates, plus chill-out music make this a fun place to unwind at close of the day. Fri-Sat music and dancing from 10:30pm-1am.

DJ and live rock music at this dance club includes Atomic Dance Party on Thursdays, featuring New Wave/80s/Alternative/India/Electronic DJ music.
From flamenco to Latin jazz, live music Fri-Sat at this Latin/tapas restaurant provides a lively night scene.

The area's destination for gambling, dining and nightlife, Casino M8trix blends spectacular views of Silicon Valley with your favorite table games, cocktails, dining, karaoke and sporting events, 24 hours a ...more
This intimate cabaret-style nightclub features a range of acts across all genres, including rock, R&B, blues, jazz, dance, folk and comedy. Check website for schedule.
Two teams of comedians compete for audience laughs and points while improvising scenes, games, operas and musicals based on audience suggestions.

Urban dining and contemporary Californian cuisine intersect deliciously at this sleek lounge, where sustainable "farm-to-table" dishes using local ingredients are served alongside craft cocktails to a modern fusion of DJ music.
Choose from more than 25 house-crafted lagers and ales, kick back and listen to live music Fri-Sat, 6-9pm. Bar open til 10:30pm.

The ultimate place for blues for more than 20 years, JJ’s offers live music nightly by both established and up-and-coming acts.
Drinks, dinner, dancing and exquisite cuisine are all on the menu at this dining and nightlife hotspot in San Jose.

Enjoy some of the best national and local comedians around, live and up-close, in this intimate setting. National comics as seen on The Tonight Show, The Late Show with Dave Letterman, HBO, Showtime and Comedy Central are often featured.
